actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Resolution to oppose the lifting of sanctions against Cuba and to request the advice and consent of the Senate prior to any proposed change in our Cuba policy.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States foreign policy should not be employed in any way to lift the sanctions against or to gain recognition of the present Cuban regime by United States or any other nation in this hemisphere. Requires that any change in U.S. foreign policy toward Cuba shall be subject to the advice and consent of the Congress.

titles.title: Resolution to oppose the lifting of sanctions against Cuba and to request the advice and consent of the Senate prior to any proposed change in our Cuba policy.
